shri lanka maha banku bandumkara ganudenuwaladi akramikathawan sidukara rajayata mulyamaya paduwak sidukala yayi chodana laba sakakaruwan wi sitina parpachuwal tresharis samagame himikaru lesa salakena arjun alosiyas saha ema samagame pradhana widhayaka niladhari kasun palisena yana dedena labana 21 wanida dakwa thawaduratath rakshitha bandhanagaragatha karana lesa kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath ranga disanayaka mahatha eeye (08da) niyoga kaleya.
